source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'OPS_CERTIFICATION_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'Y'
			   and etl_utc_tag = '@{pipeline().parameters.Etl_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as Processed_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and etl_utc_tag is null
			   and original_blob_name like '@{pipeline().parameters.File_Pattern}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as Not_Processed_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and (etl_run_status like 'FAIL%' or etl_run_status like 'RUN%')
			   and etl_utc_tag = '@{pipeline().parameters.Etl_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as ErrorDuringProcess_Files
;

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Certification_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Number as string,
		{Next Audit_Date} as string,
		{Certifying_Body } as string,
		Certification_Date as string,
		Certification_End_Date as string,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Minor_CARs as string,
		Major_Cars as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
source(output(
		Certification_Type_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Certification_Type_Code]\nFROM [relational].[OPS_Certification_Type]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalCertificationType
ValidatedCertificationDandDate@ValidDateAndCertificationID, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationAsset
IsValidCertificationType@ValidCertificationType select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date = {Next Audit_Date},
		{Certifying_Body },
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Minor_CARs,
		Major_Cars
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndCertificationID split(not(isNull(Derived_Certification_Id)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && iif(not(isNull({Next Audit_Date})),not(isNull(Derived_Next_Audit_Date)),true()) && iif(not(isNull(Certification_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Certification_Date)),true()) && iif(not(isNull(Certification_End_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Certification_End_Date)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedCertificationDandDate@(ValidDateAndCertificationID, InvalidDateOrCertificationID)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Next_Audit_Date = toDate({Next Audit_Date},"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Certification_Id = toInteger(Certification_ID),
		Derived_Certification_Date = toDate(Certification_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Certification_End_Date = toDate(Certification_End_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy")) ~> ConvertDateAndCertificationID
InvalidDateOrCertificationIDerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date = {Next Audit_Date},
		{Certifying_Body },
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Validation_Error,
		Minor_CARs,
		Major_Cars
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrCertificationID
ValidatedCertificationDandDate@InvalidDateOrCertificationID derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period / Certificatiation Date / Certification End Date/ Next Audit Date / Certification ID")) ~> InvalidDateOrCertificationIDerrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date = {Next Audit_Date},
		{Certifying_Body },
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Validation_Error,
		Minor_CARs,
		Major_Cars
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrCertificationID, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset, SelectInvalidCertificationType union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset, SelectRelationalCertificationType lookup(Certification_Type_Code == Relation_Certification_Type_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationalIncidentType
RelationalCertificationType select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Certification_Type_Code = Certification_Type_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalCertificationType
LookupRelationalIncidentType split(not(isNull(Relation_Certification_Type_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidCertificationType@(ValidCertificationType, InvalidCertificationType)
IsValidCertificationType@InvalidCertificationType derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Certification Type Code")) ~> InvalidCertificationTypeerrormessage
InvalidCertificationTypeerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date = {Next Audit_Date},
		{Certifying_Body },
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Validation_Error,
		Minor_CARs,
		Major_Cars
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidCertificationType
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Certification_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as string,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as string,
		Certification_End_Date as string,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Validation_Error as string,
		Minor_CARS as string,
		Major_CARS as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body = {Certifying_Body },
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Validation_Error,
		Minor_CARS = Minor_CARs,
		Major_CARS = Major_Cars
	)) ~> StagingDB

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Certification]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Certification_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as string,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as string,
		Certification_End_Date as string,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Validation_Error as string,
		Minor_CARS as string,
		Major_CARS as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Certification_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as date,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as date,
		Certification_End_Date as date,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Minor_CARS as integer,
		Major_CARS as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalCertification
GenerateStagingChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		StagingChecksum,
		Minor_CARS,
		Major_CARS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectStagingData
SelectNewRecordData derive(insert_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
RelationalCertification derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Certification_Type_Code,Certification_Number,Next_Audit_Date,Certifying_Body,Certification_Date,Certification_End_Date,Certified_Entity,Minor_CARS,Major_CARS)) ~> GenerateRelationalChecksum
GenerateRelationalChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Certification_ID = Certification_ID,
		Relation_Reporting_Period = Reporting_Period,
		Relation_Certification_Type_Code = Certification_Type_Code,
		Relation_Certification_Number = Certification_Number,
		Relation_Next_Audit_Date = Next_Audit_Date,
		Relation_Certifying_Body = Certifying_Body,
		Relation_Certification_Date = Certification_Date,
		Relation_Certification_End_Date = Certification_End_Date,
		Relation_Certified_Entity = Certified_Entity,
		Relation_Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime,
		Relation_Update_Datetime = Update_Datetime,
		Relation_Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum,
		Minor_CARS,
		Major_CARS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalData
ConvertDatesAndID derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Certification_Type_Code,Certification_Number,Next_Audit_Date,Certifying_Body,Certification_Date,Certification_End_Date,Certified_Entity,Minor_CARS,Major_CARS)) ~> GenerateStagingChecksum
SelectStagingData, SelectRelationalData lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Certification_ID == Relation_Certification_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CompareKeys
AddAuditColumns, SelectChangeRecord union(byName: true)~> UnionNewAndExisting
NewAndExistingCertification@NewCertification select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Minor_CARS = {NewAndExistingCertification@NewCertification@Minor_CARS},
		Major_CARS = {NewAndExistingCertification@NewCertification@Major_CARS}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewRecordData
UnionNewAndExisting alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
StagingDB derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Next_Audit_Date = toDate(Next_Audit_Date, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Certification_ID = toInteger(Certification_ID),
		Certification_Date = toDate(Certification_Date, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Certification_End_Date = toDate(Certification_End_Date, "dd/MM/yyyy")) ~> ConvertDatesAndID
CompareKeys split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> NewAndExistingCertification@(NewCertification, ChangedCertification, ExistingNoChange)
NewAndExistingCertification@ChangedCertification derive(update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> ChangedAddAuditData
ChangedAddAuditData select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID = Relation_Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		insert_datetime = Relation_Insert_Datetime,
		update_datetime,
		process_name,
		Minor_CARS = {NewAndExistingCertification@ChangedCertification@Minor_CARS},
		Major_CARS = {NewAndExistingCertification@ChangedCertification@Major_CARS}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectChangeRecord
AlterRowUpsert sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Certification_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as date,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as date,
		Certification_End_Date as date,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Minor_CARS as integer,
		Major_CARS as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Certification_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Insert_Datetime = insert_datetime,
		Update_Datetime = update_datetime,
		Process_Name = process_name,
		Minor_CARS,
		Major_CARS
	)) ~> UpserttRow
